result.execSummary:
The defendant Romesha Quantrell Allen was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Romesha Quantrell Allen in court with attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: AMI
On motion of the State, Court ordered charge amended to Retail Theft, contrary to Wisconsin Statutes sections 63.043, a City Ordinance.
 
Defendant enters a plea of no contest. Court found the Defendant guilty. Court orders Defendant to pay a forfeiture of $25.00 including costs to be paid by 08-15-016 or Civil Judgment.

Defendant Romesha Quantrell Allen in court.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing. Attorney Daniel Mitchell is no longer available for today's proceedings.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 31.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 14, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
-From Nurturing Concepts LLC. on behalf of the defendant; received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Defendant Romesha Quantrell Allen in court with attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Matter before the Court for Plea/sentencing.  Parties engaged in new negotiations; request for adjournment granted by the Court.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for May 27, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Romesha Quantrell Allen in court with attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin. For reasons stated on the record court ordered case adjourned for status conference possible plea and sentencing hearing in Branch 31.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for April 11, 2016 at 08:30 am.
$250.00 signature bond to continue was never forfeited.
Court ordered bench warrant withdrawn.  Recall issued.

Defendant Romesha Quantrell Allen in court.  Jeffrey James Altenburg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case is adjourned for a Final PreTrail on 3-9-2016, at 8:30 am. Branch 31, Judge Rifelj.
  Final pre-trial scheduled for March 9, 2016 at 08:30 am.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell in court.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  vk  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  Court takes bail forfeiture under advisement.

Defendant Romesha Quantrell Allen in court with attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for plea hearing. Defense requests final pre-trial and jury trial dates. All parties are notified that effective 12-1-15 this case will be assigned to Reserve Judge, Branch 31, in Room 615 of the Courthouse. 
  Final pre-trial scheduled for February 23, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for March 21, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Romesha Quantrell Allen in court with attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea. For reasons stated on the record,   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 37.  Plea hearing scheduled for November 24, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Romesha Quantrell Allen in court with attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Status conference held off the record. New defense counsel just appointed.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 37.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea hearing scheduled for November 3, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Romesha Quantrell Allen in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC.   Status conference scheduled for September 24, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Romesha Quantrell Allen in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Defendant Romesha Quantrell Allen in court with attorney Colin P. McGinn.  Defendant Romesha Quantrell Allen in custody.  Ronald Dague appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  Defendant HAS A LOWER PENDING CASE AND is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 4, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
